name: Optica
description: A mind-bending puzzle game of logic and illusion. Embracing simplicity with a geometric design, Optica reveals puzzles in complex and mind-bending ways. From curious shapes and optical illusions to unexpected perspectives, Optica puts spatial thinking to the test through 70+ challenging levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
